name: Ophanim
description: The Ophanim is a large celestial creature with remarkable physical and magical attributes, characterized by its glowing form and majestic presence.
memorable: The ability to instantly sense lies makes the Ophanim a formidable truth-seeker and guardian.
goals: Typically serves as a protector or guide for those who align with its ideals.
relations: Often associated with other celestial beings and may serve as a guardian for divine causes.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or locations of great significance to good-aligned beings.
strengths: Exceptional physical and magical defenses, potent spellcasting, and the unique ability to discern deception.
attacks: Can unleash four radiant Light of Judgment attacks and a devastating Holy Fire ability.
most_powerful_ability: Holy Fire, which deals significant radiant damage and can reduce enemies to ash.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet and has a remarkable passive perception of 22.
skills: Proficient in insight and perception, enhancing its ability to understand and perceive its environment.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage.
Resists radiant damage and non-magical physical damage.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Innate spellcaster with a spell save DC of 21, enabling powerful spellcasting.
Can commune for guidance and bring allies back to life with true resurrection.
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will and has a range of powerful spells available for daily use.
test_queries: large celestial guardian with radiant attacks
guardian that can sense lies and cast spells
formidable celestial that protects good beings
